formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Updated Information on Ethan’s Recent Absences

Dear Dr. [Last Name],

I hope you are well. I’m following up regarding Ethan’s recent absences from Greenwood Elementary and any medical considerations the school should keep in mind as he transitions back to class.

When you have a moment, could you please share:
• A brief summary of the reason for Ethan’s absences (as much detail as you are comfortable providing for the school record).  
• Any current treatment plan, medications, or activity restrictions we should accommodate.  
• Recommended classroom or schedule modifications (e.g., extra rest breaks, reduced physical-education participation, dietary considerations, etc.).  
• Expected timeline for full return to usual activities and any upcoming appointments we should note.

For your convenience, you can reference the details I’ve included in our prior email thread and on the shared Notion page; feel free to add comments or upload relevant documents there. If another format is easier, just let me know.

Your guidance is invaluable in helping us support Ethan effectively. Thank you in advance, and please don’t hesitate to reach out if you need additional information from the school’s side.

Warm regards,

Mrs. Thompson  
School Nurse, Greenwood Elementary School  
mrs.thompson@greenwoodelementary.edu  
(555) 123-4567
